Wisdom: الْفِكْرُ عِبَادَةٌ
enWisdom: Contemplation is worship

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْعِبَادَةِ الْفِكْرُ
enWisdom: The best worship is contemplation

Wisdom: لَا عِبَادَةَ كَالتَّفْكِيرِ
enWisdom: There is no worship like contemplation

Wisdom: التَّفَكُّرُ فِي آلَاءِ اللَّهِ نِعْمَ الْعِبَادَةُ
enWisdom: Thinking about the bounties of Allah is the best worship

Wisdom: مَنْ تَفَكَّرَ فِي آلَاءِ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ وُفِّقَ
enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: الْفِكْرُ يُنِيرُ اللُّبَّ
enWisdom: Contemplation illuminates the mind

Wisdom: الْفِكْرُ نُزْهَةُ الْمُتَّقِينَ
enWisdom: Thinking is the recreation of the God-fearing

Wisdom: الْفِكْرَةُ مِرْآةٌ صَافِيَةٌ
enWisdom: Thought is a gleaming mirror

Wisdom: الْفِكْرُ جَلَاءُ الْعُقُولِ
enWisdom: Thinking is the polish of the minds

Wisdom: الْفِكْرُ فِي الْخَيْرِ يَدْعُو إِلَى الْعَمَلِ بِهِ [بِارْتِيَاحٍ‏]
enWisdom: Thinking about good [action] invites one to act upon it

Wisdom: الْفِكْرُ إِحْدَى الْهِدَايَتَيْنِ
enWisdom: Thinking is one of the two means of guidance

Wisdom: التَّدْبِيرُ بِالرَّأْيِ وَالرَّأْيُ بِالْفِكْرِ
enWisdom: Planning comes with consideration and consideration comes with contemplation

Wisdom: مَا ذَلَّ مَنْ أَحْسَنَ الْفِكْرَ
enWisdom: He who excels in thinking never gets humiliated

Wisdom: أَفْكِرْ تُفِقْ
enWisdom: Reflect and you will awaken [and become alert]

Wisdom: التَّفَكُّرُ فِي مَلَكُوتِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ عِبَادَةُ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
enWisdom: Thinking about the kingdom of the heavens and earth is the worship of the sincere ones

Wisdom: تَفَكَّرْ قَبْلَ أَنْ تَعْزِمَ وَشَاوِرْ قَبْلَ أَنْ تُقْدِمَ وَتَدَبَّرْ قَبْلَ أَنْ تَهْجُمَ
enWisdom: Think before you decide, consult before you proceed and ponder before you rush forward

Wisdom: رَوِّ قَبْلَ الْفِعْلِ كَيْ لَا تُعَابَ بِمَا تَفْعَلُ
enWisdom: Deliberate before [taking] action [and] you will not be criticized for what you do

Wisdom: طُوبَى لِمَنْ شَغَلَ قَلْبَهُ بِالْفِكْرِ وَلِسَانَهُ بِالذِّكْرِ
enWisdom: Blessed is the one who occupies his heart with reflection and his tongue with remembrance [of Allah]

Wisdom: فِكْرُ سَاعَةٍ قَصِيرَةٍ خَيْرٌ مِنْ عِبَادَةٍ طَوِيلَةٍ
enWisdom: Thinking for a short while is better than prolonged worship

Wisdom: فَضْلُ فِكْرٍ وَتَفَهُّمٍ أَنْجَعُ مِنْ فَضْلِ تَكْرَارٍ وَدِرَاسَةٍ
enWisdom: The merit of thinking and understanding is more beneficial than the merit of revision and study

Wisdom: مَنْ تَأَمَّلَ اعْتَبَرَ
enWisdom: One who ponders [about the past] learns a lesson [from it]

Wisdom: مَنْ أَسْهَرَ عَيْنَ فِكْرَتِهِ بَلَغَ كُنْهَ هِمَّتِهِ
enWisdom: One who keeps his mind’s eye awake reaches the height of his endeavour

Wisdom: لَا تَسْتَعْمِلُوا الرَّأْيَ فِيمَا لَا يُدْرِكُهُ الْبَصَرُ وَلَا تَتَغَلْغَلُ فِيهِ الْفِكَرُ
enWisdom: Do not use opinion [and conjecture] in that which is neither perceived by sight nor penetrated by thought

Wisdom: لَا تُخْلِ نَفْسَكَ مِنْ فِكْرَةٍ تُزِيدُكَ حِكْمَةً وَعِبْرَةٍ تُفِيدُكَ عِصْمَةً
enWisdom: Do not let your soul be devoid of a thought that increases your wisdom and a lesson that safeguards you [from sin]

Wisdom: إِنَّ رَأْيَكَ لَا يَتَّسِعُ لِكُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ فَفَرِّغْهُ لِلْمُهِمِّ
enWisdom: Indeed your opinion cannot encompass everything, so leave it for the important [issues]

Wisdom: مَنْ أَضَاعَ الرَّأْيَ ارْتَبَكَ
enWisdom: One who fails to apply the [correct] opinion becomes disconcerted

Wisdom: مَنْ أَعْمَلَ الرَّأْيَ غَنِمَ
enWisdom: One who acts on the [correct] opinion, benefits [from it]

Wisdom: فِكْرُكَ [ذِكْرُكَ‏] فِي الْمَعْصِيَةِ يَحْدُوكَ عَلَى الْوُقُوعِ فِيهَا
enWisdom: Your thinking about sin drives you to fall into it
